update.description:
I realized that SetDamping is the same in all derived ODE*Joint classes, so I moved it into ODEJoint.cc.

Added a flag so ConnectJointUpdate is not called repeatedly when SetDamping is called.

Added a flag change when SetDamping is called so the new coefficient takes effect.

---

allows infinite viscous damping coefficient at the cost of 1 new constraint row.

by product:  implemented GetAttribute (analogous to SetAttribute) and fixed setting lo\_stop and hi\_stop (previously ignored joint index).
update.title: use cfm for viscous damping.

content.raw: Add else clause here to output an error that a screw joint was not not found when attempting to get "thread_pitch"
content.html: Add else clause here to output an error that a screw joint was not not found when attempting to get "thread_pitch"

content.raw: Limit i to a maximum of 2.
cfmDampingState is set to size 2 in the header. The for loop here is not limited to 2.
content.html: cfmDampingState is set to size 2 in the header. The for loop here is not limited to 2.

content.raw: Would it be possible to have this feature disabled by default? A function in Joint could enable/disable this feature. Then you could turn this on for for the Sandia hands and the ankles.
content.html: Would it be possible to have this feature disabled by default? A function in Joint could enable/disable this feature. Then you could turn this on for for the Sandia hands and the ankles.
